A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film plays on old nostalgic moments from the original trilogy while making its own originality. The fact that all our fan theories didn't turn out what we theorized.... Is a great thing! They did their job. They were creative and original. It caught you off guard? Got you a little upset? Good. The movie did its job and got a reaction out of you. That's what those moments where filmed for. People are so easily dissatisfied these days and I'm looking mainly at the complaining annoying fans. I'm a HUGE star wars fan myself. Infact I hated it when Disney shut down the original expanded universe.... But you know what.... I love star wars and a good star wars movie is a good star wars movie. Stop the hating.
